评论详情: Perfect fit true to size
We don’t buy suits often but we took a chance on the blue $60 suit. In my opinion, it’s great. No complaints.
El pantalón es demasiado ancho y la manga de la chaqueta es muy larga
Too big

I regret ordering a Large, despite being 6'3, 195 lbs. I feel like this is my dad's suit in that it swallows me whole. I guess I'm used to wearing slim fit suits and this classic fit just isn't my style.  I also kind of hate the color / texture of this. In the listing, the photos make this look gorgeous - it's a deep maroon color that has the appearance of wool almost. But in person, it just looks like a cheap sharkskin red suit and I will probably never wear it in public. I absolutely despise when companies list photos for a different product that looks nothing like what you receive and the color is WAY off on this. Coofandy is generally a brand I would trust but this was a miss.  The only plus I can think to mention is that the pants have a ton of stretch in the waist which makes them super comfy to wear, but this thing needs a tailor like I need a million bucks.
Needed a suit for a wedding. Good fit overall. The jacket is a little big on me but worked out well
Main issue is the pant. You can't order a suite and based the size of the coat to the pant. Pant legs are definitely larger than "relax fit"

评论概述: Stylish and Well-Fitting Suit for Any Occasion!
评论详情: The COOFANDY Men Suits Classic Fit 2 Piece Suit Set is an excellent choice for anyone looking for a stylish, high-quality suit at a great price. The one-button blazer fits perfectly, offering a sharp, clean look that’s ideal for weddings, business events, or casual gatherings. The fabric feels durable yet comfortable, and the suit provides just the right amount of stretch for ease of movement. I love the versatility of the separates, allowing me to mix and match for different occasions. Whether for a formal wedding or a more casual outing, this suit is a great option. The classic fit is flattering without being too tight or too loose. Overall, this is a fantastic suit set and an amazing value. Highly recommend!
This One Button Casual Blazer Suit is a nice set! It is surprising how nice the material feels. And the suit is well-made. The suit is tailored well and cuts nicely.
Got this as a gift for a family member and it fits great! True to size and feels like good quality. The red is a nice deep dark hue and seems comfortable and well fitted.
This suit is well made and lined.  It will make a good traveling suit, which is what I wanted.  XL fits me at 6-1 225lbs.
Color looks different

This suit fits exactly as I hoped and expected.  The color is well represented online. It is dark and rich. The quality of the material is excellent. For the price, this is a great buy. This suit can definitely be worn to formal occasions.  It is comfortable to wear, and it looks great.
It's a little undersized for me, but I knew it would be from the listing. I can JUST barely shut the blazer buttons.
Jacket small and pants have no elasticity.
Great material and perfect fit for me

评论概述: Nice elegant feel, SLIM fit suit, looks good. Price is great!
评论详情: COOFANDY Men Suits Classic Fit 2 Piece Suit Set One Button Casual Blazer Wedding Business Suit Separates.  This is a low cost suit, but it Really delivers! I measured and ordered my size from the chart. The suit arrived and needed full steaming to get the wrinkles out. But fit great, and looks good. This is a suit for a slimmer build. The jacket is slightly too snug through the chest, but I can button it. Again, this is a slim cut suit. The jacket has a single button. The fabric (100% Polyester) is rich feeling, like a wool/linen blend, a bit nubby, matte dark blue, hangs and wears and feels very nice. I am happy with this suit. For the price (about $90 at time of order), it is a great value!
Another well made Coofandy set. Great quality overall fits as expected would recommend

评论概述: Good Suit, Little Tight Compared to Size Tag
评论详情: The looks good and looks like it will hold up well. It was a little tight for the ordered size. The color looks decent and fits well with my wardrobe.
I bought the suit for a wedding in the Dominican. Should be good  in the heat.
Great suit! Can’t beat the price! Great quality! Husband and son love suits! Will definitely buy more!
The fit from blazer was great. I have to get pants tailored. The color was nice and very comfortable to wear. Great value for the money.
This is a nice well-fitting suit. The pants need to be altered but the jacket fit perfectly. Good material and looks like more than the sticker price.

It's 100% polyester and feels like it's made out of cardboard or really thick canvas which is not nice.  I ordered a small and both the jacket and pants are way too big for me.  But they do fit my much taller son and as he has never worn a suit this is his now.  I do like the sown in white pocket square.
Material is nice, I’m able to move freely in it. My size fits me great.

Just unpacked it and wasn't very impressed. It was meant as a very casual business attire, but the cut , especially the pants, isn't great. Also: it arrived very wrinkled, this packing for a suit is not th best.

Ordered this as a roll of the dice on how it would fit since its not numeric sized but rather a jacket and pant set in letter sizes. I ended up ordering an XL and thankfully it fit (usually wear a 48R and 34 or 36 waist pants). The pants have a nice built-in stretch waist so there is a little play in the size and also makes it more forgiving in seasonal variation of body size. The jacket was a little tight in the center chest but still forgiving enough so make it wearable, just would have to unbutton it to sit down. The material is what you'd expect from a suit in this price range and would be comparable to what you'd find at an H&M store. I like the light grey color since it was what I was missing in my wardrobe and will be a good option for spring and summer. I did wish it was 2 button instead of 1, but could help in dressing it down with a pair of nice jeans or a non-dress shirt under it. Also not a fan of the sewn-in pocket square, if you even want to call it that, since it only sticks out a tiny bit and is just a plain white verses something that would go with any color dress shirt. Might try and remove it since I am not a fan. Overall this is a decent option for the price and was satisfied with how it fit, considering it's always a gamble ordering online.

Overall, I like the suit just fine, but I do have a few things to mention. Being that it was a classic fit suit, I decided to order a medium as opposed to a large, which I would normally order. I think that was a smart decision, because the fit of the medium was quite good on my frame. Just for reference, I'm 5 foot 11 and 195 lbs. My build is muscular, because I train about five days a week, and have done so for decades. So, if you are similar to me in so far as your body type, then I would recommend the medium. As is usually the case everything fits well, but for the pant legs being too long. These pants will certainly need to be hemmed, and the model in the listing must be over 6 feet tall. The one thing that I was sort of not the biggest fan of, is the color. I chose the navy blue, because I wanted a nice dark blue suit. While the suit is certainly dark blue, the fabric has embedded within it some black strands as well as dark blue. So, you get this effect of a blue suit with black strands. After seeing the listing again, I inspected the pictures closely, and noticed that there actually was one picture that depicts accurately what the fabric looks like. When you see the other pictures of the model wearing the suit, it just seems like it's a regular navy suit, which is what I wanted. Don't get me wrong, it's not ugly by any stretch of the imagination, it's just not exactly as I had anticipated. That being said, it's a fairly well made suit, that does sort of feel a little like its price range. It has a nice style, but it does feel like polyester. There are some nice features like a built in pocket square, and a stretchy waistband for the pants. All in all, it's a decent suit, but not one that blew me away. Once I get the pants hemmed, I'm sure I'll like it a lot more, but my initial impressions are mostly positive.

This suit surprised me when I put it on because it fit (medium) great and looked very nice. I typically do not have any reason to wear formal attire but this turned out to be a great purchase. However, there is one notable aspect that influenced my overall assessment of the suit: the fabric weight. The suit feels heavy and can be a bit cumbersome if worn in hot weather so make sure to plan accordingly.

评论概述: Kind of Fits, Kind of Doesn’t
评论详情: WHAT’S INCLUDED: Suit Jacket Suit Pants  PRODUCT/THOUGHTS: I got the size XL in dark grey. This is a little bit hard since usually in the USA when it comes to formal clothes for men, we don’t go off of L, XL, XXL..etc We usually work with numbers directly.  The pants actually fit well, and they actually have elastic stretch in them for the waist which is FANTASTIC because I always feel like that is the most comfortable. The length came in for me though at about 32 inches and that's a little bit on the long side (I'm usually odd-sized, at 31 inseam) but it's okay.  The jacket mostly fits, It has a bit of tapering along the sides, but it’s just a little bit too slim for me as I’m a person with wide shoulders. That also widens my overall girth. So I can’t button this jacket and sit down. Have to leave it open. So it feels like the jacket doesn’t quite match the size of the pants included. I would need the same size pants that I got, but with one size up of Jacket for this to work correctly (XXL) with how this is made. I also found one odd thing with the jacket. The shoulders have a bit of too much flair at the corners. I’ll try to share an image of what I’m talking about. It didn’t come out very good on camera, but they stick up just a bit too much even though the jacket as it is, is actually a bit Snug. This would make sense if the jacket itself was too big on me, but it’s not.  Overall the construction is actually pretty good though and this beats out some other suit separates that I have reviewed. They give you an extra jacket button as well. Although I do wish this was a double-breasted suit and not a single closure.

Jacket is on the smaller side shoulder wise even though the XL is supposed to be 50R, Pants fit great and are stretchy which is good, I'm 6ft3 and a 50R in regular fit but the jacket is like a slim regular fit, if you can get the jacket separately in a larger size, I would

评论概述: Not too bad, but could be better
评论详情: So the jacket fit me very well.  I’m 5 foot four with the very athletic build.  The material for the jacket and the pants are not the best one may describe it as a little bit rough.  The jacket did fit very well, and you can probably rock it with a pair of blue jeans.  The pants, however, are not very well designed.  Because the waistband is adjustable they’re always seem to be a bunch of cloth or material in the groin area which gives you very weird. Look like you have a potato sack in front of you.  Probably will not wear the pants at all and will keep the jacket.
Fit perfectly!  Just a bit of ironing and looked great!

The material looks a bit crisp, but the cut is perfect and really flatters my sons' body. He chose according to the sizing chart. The suit does not look super expensive, but I am very impressed with the cut. That makes it the best suit he owns. For a college kid, it's all he needs.

评论概述: Good price.  Runs a bit smaller than the listed sizes
评论详情: I like the fabric and color.  It's nice for the pricepoint.  However I found that the suit ran smaller than the stated size according to the sizing chart.

This suit fits to size. I ordered dark gray in size 2X. My pants fit perfectly and the jacket fit is very good. The 100% polyester material doesn't hang as well as higher quality materials but the cut and overall look of the suit far exceeds its $82.99 price as of this writing.  I like the sewn-in pocket square of the welt pocket on the jacket. That finishes off the jacket well. I think the jacket would look nicer with a two button front instead of a single button. The jacket comes with an extra set of buttons, but instead of being sewn to the inside of the jacket lining, the buttons are inside a plastic baggie that is tied to the collar hanger tab.  Alas, this is a low cost suit that can be carried on vacations and weekend jaunts to be ready for those dress up dinners on cruises, high end hotels and cocktail parties. I can carry this suit without the worry of having a more expensive suit damaged or lost by the airline. The suit still looks nice enough to pass muster at a nice event.  The suit arrived folded and packed into a slide lock plastic bag. The pants are not very wrinkled but the coat has considerable wrinkles that should relax with hanging or mild steaming. I expect to get a lot of use out of this suit. This suit is a very good value at its price point. 5 stars for value.

So far I've tested eleven pieces of clothing from Coofandy and I actively look for them in my review queue now.  I've always had issues with no-name clothing brands sold here, but not with Coofandy.  It's inexpensive, fits well, is usually stylish.  The quality is roughly H&M quality, so not the best quality but you get good quality for what you pay, and that's good enough for me.  This suit is an example of how Coofandy is.  I wear this suit to an expensive beach resort and I look and feel like a guy who just rolled up in an Aston Martin, even though this suit is very inexpensive; I could jump into the pool in this suit and I wouldn't cry about it, while I would never do that in say, one of my Brionis.This suit in Medium is cut for a 40-41 standard chest with R length.  The pants are cut for a 34 waist and 32 length, with expandable elastic built into the waistband, which is one of my favorite features of Coofandy trousers.  I can wear a pair of their trousers knowing it cinches up to me under normal conditions but I can also eat at a buffet and it will just expand comfortably.  The pockets are functional but are stitched closed (you need to open them but I recommend you keep them sewn flat).  There is an inside jacket pocket.  Also note that while there is a lapel pocket, there is a permanent white "mock handkerchief" inside of it properly angled to the pocket which looks nice but you can't remove it.  Also note that the jacket is a ONE BUTTON jacket which is very unconventional for suit jackets, making this suit jacket a casual styled jacket.  I would consider this fancy resort wear instead of a formal suit, appropriate for say, beach weddings or photos.

评论概述: Great Casual Suit!  Fits as Expected!
评论详情: This is a great casual suit that looks great and feels great.  My son who is 5'11" 165lbs with a 34 waist ordered a large and it fit him perfect.  He loves the suit and plans on wearing it to his cousins wedding next month.  The nice thing about the suit is you can pair it with your wardrobe and mix and match it with other items very easily.  I would highly recommend this suit especially at this price-point!

评论概述: I took a gamble going back to classic fit for a change and am actually happy with this
评论详情: In recent years as in the past eight I have been wearing slim fitting clothes to work. I usually dress within a business casual style, with always wearing a blazer, suit or tuxedo. Being that I just listed casual to formal options; you get the idea that I have a bit of flexibility with what I wear and I'm grateful for that. I had been thinking of trying out a regular fit, though slightly slim as in the slacks are raised, suit that is of a reasonable price range. I did not have to look far before choosing the Coofandy brand. I trust this brand to provide me with a lower priced suit that has decent stitching and not drastic inconsistencies with the sewing lines. What i mean by that last observation is often with lower priced suits there will be threading issues witht he shoulders often being the culprit. If you look at the stitching around the shoulders often even with higher prices suits there will be inconsistencies that are barely noticeable but if so indicates the brands attention or lack of to that little detail. Being that i am talking about stitching and unevenness goes to show i have had way too much experience with wearing blazers or suits. I basically partially live in a suit, or a more casual variation with a less fancy sport coat, so my opinions about the lower priced options hold a good deal of validity based on experience. I was not at all surprised to find this traditional fir suit from the Coofandy brand fitting just right. As I have said many times, when it comes to non-tailored suits, you want to find a brand that fits within the regular sizes of small through extra larges, then stay with it. That is if you are lucky enough to have a brand like this that works well with your suite size. This solid color dark grey suit boarders on black and really can pass for either color. It was difficult for me to choose the color because there were so many to choose from. This is just a 2-piece suit, but I am actually happy it's like that, because I do not always wear a vest. The slacks are comfy and work well with my waist. These fit like a 33 waist but also can pass for 34. I wear anything from 34 to 32 so this fit is actually kind to my waist. I can tell the blazer is going to last me a long time. With the slacks the stitching seems good but the coat is more promising in that it seems like I will still have it five years from now. I am again impressed with the Coofandy brand and have never been let down by them. This two-piece suit is fantastic.

I’ve been looking for a more casual suit for an upcoming cruise.  This set fits the bill.  The jacket fits me well (size large was a perfect fit for me).  I like the one-button design.  This jacket would also work well with jeans.  The tailoring and materials are both of good quality.  The pants have a lot of waist adjustments which I don’t really need- they seem a tad short perhaps.  But as pictured in the product listing with tennis shoes are a good length.  The only downside is that - as received and packed - this set will need pressing before wearing.  I was hoping it would be good to go out of the package.  Overall though - a nice casual and versatile suit for a great price.
Excelente, justo lo que esperaba. Buenas calidad
